column6:
ZEMO vs. the GRANDMASTER in a climactic confrontation! Civil War has fractured the superhuman community -- but are they willing to band together for one brief moment -- to give ZEMO the ultimate power he needs to save the world -- even if it could also mean sacrificing the planet to the mysterious Guardian Protocols? And most importantly... will the THUNDERBOLTS trust ZEMO with so much power? ,2006,11
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Gary Erskine | penciller (cover):Tom Grummett | writer:Fabian Nicieza | colorist:Chris Sotomayor | letterer:Richard Starkings
